thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 6 de 698
thread.title: Thomas

author: Thomas
title: Thomas
text: I booked a car online and paid with my wife's credit card. Because of that after the flight at the airport they refused me a car and said that the money was gone. Oops!!! Sorry!!! I tried to fight and said that there was no such info on their website. The guy showed me an 8-page Terms and Conditions book. I asked why did they accept the payment from another person's credit card. He just showed me the palms of his hands. THIEVES
